body: Wait.. so what happened to Yurika? Lmao

So the blonde girl with the twin-tail hairstyle (Yurika, l think) gets stripped for a short yuri scene, before Kawagoe (the onii-chan) comes in, then she watches Kawagoe have sex with the timid manager, and then she was mysteriously spirited away sometime during the second act to be gang-raped. ......ok.
